thread.title: Britain’s youngest mum, raped by brother aged 11, pregnant again
thread.title_full: Britain’s youngest mum, raped by brother aged 11, pregnant again

title: Britain’s youngest mum, raped by brother aged 11, pregnant again
text:
Published 14th February 2017 
ALEX HEWITT BABY JOY: Tressa Middleton, who had baby Toni at 12, is expecting again with Darren Young 
The Scot – who has bravely waived her right to anonymity as a rape victim – was forced to give up her first daughter after social services discovered Jason was the dad. 
But Tressa, now aged 23, is delighted to be pregnant again with her fiance Darren Young. 
Tressa, of Bathgate, West Lothian, became a heroin addict – spending up to £400 a day on the drug – after social workers took away her baby girl. 
SPINDRIFT JAILED: Jason Middleton was jailed for raping his sister Tressa 
But she has cleaned herself up and is now expecting with long-term partner Darren, 30. 
And the mum, whose new baby is due this autumn, has vowed not to give up her second child. 
ALEX HEWITT FIRST LOVE: Tressa looked after Toni for two years “I thought I was being punished” Tressa Middleton 
She told the Mirror: “This time the baby is coming into a happy, secure home with two adults who are going to adore him or her and do everything we can to make sure they have a healthy and happy upbringing. 
“I will tell our child about their big sister. There will be no secrets because she is still a big part of our family. 
“My hope is that one day my two babies can meet each other but who knows whether that will happen.” 
ALEX HEWITT HAPPY COUPLE: Tressa and Darren have been trying to conceive for 18 months 
As a troubled child, Tressa would perform sexual favours for booze, cigarettes and small change. 
She revealed she had sex with an old man for £2 when she was just nine in an interview two years ago. 
Tressa initially protected Jason after she fell pregnant aged 11 – telling relatives the baby was the result of a drunken one-night stand. 
She was allowed to keep her daughter, Toni, for two years after giving birth in 2006. 
But after finally admitting Jason was the dad she was denied contact with child. 
Jason Middleton was jailed for raping his sister when he was 16. 
ALEX HEWITT YOUNG MUM: Tressa with Toni after giving birth 
Toni is now almost as old as Tressa was when she had her. 
Tressa and Darren struggled to conceive and she feared she was being punished for giving up Toni. Bump It Up: The Most Popular Pregnant Celeb Photos Thursday, 2nd February 2017 See a list of celebrities who posed naked and pregnant for magazines and more scandalous nude celeb baby bump photos. 1 / 20 
She said: “I know it sounds crazy but when I was trying to fall pregnant and it wasn’t happening, I thought the worst. 
“Not having my daughter with me still affects me every single day and I thought I was being punished for what happened with her, for letting her go.” Related articles
